#New UCAIR Java Implementation

= Running =

  * Make sure you have [http://java.com/en/download/index.jsp Java 7]
  * Make sure the "java" command is on your system path. [http://java.com/en/download/help/path.xml How do I set or change the PATH system variable?]
  * Download [http://code.google.com/p/ucair/downloads/detail?name=ucair-java-bin-2013-05-08.zip&can=2&q= ucair-java-bin-2013-05-08.zip] and unpack.
  * Run start.bat
  * Point your browser to [http://localhost:10816]
